fi.harism.curl

Class CurlMesh

  • java.lang.Object
    • fi.harism.curl.CurlMesh

  • public class CurlMesh
extends java.lang.Object
    Class implementing actual curl/page rendering.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      CurlMesh(int maxCurlSplits)
      Constructor for mesh object.

    • Constructor Detail

      • CurlMesh

        public CurlMesh(int maxCurlSplits)
        Constructor for mesh object.
        Parameters:
        maxCurlSplits - Maximum number curl can be divided into. The bigger the value the smoother curl will be. With the cost of having more polygons for drawing.

    • Method Detail

      • curl

        public void curl(PointF curlPos,
        PointF curlDir,
        double radius)
        Sets curl for this mesh.
        Parameters:
        curlPos - Position for curl 'center'. Can be any point on line collinear to curl.
        curlDir - Curl direction, should be normalized.
        radius - Radius of curl.

      • getTexturePage

        public CurlPage getTexturePage()
        Getter for textures page for this mesh.

      • onDrawFrame

        public void onDrawFrame(GL10 gl)
        Renders our page curl mesh.

      • reset

        public void reset()
        Resets mesh to 'initial' state. Meaning this mesh will draw a plain textured rectangle after call to this method.

      • resetTexture

        public void resetTexture()
        Resets allocated texture id forcing creation of new one. After calling this method you most likely want to set bitmap too as it's lost. This method should be called only once e.g GL context is re-created as this method does not release previous texture id, only makes sure new one is requested on next render.

      • setFlipTexture

        public void setFlipTexture(boolean flipTexture)
        If true, flips texture sideways.

      • setRect

        public void setRect(RectF r)
        Update mesh bounds.
